data.title: 30 Facts About The Movie A Little Princess
data.meta_description: Discover fascinating facts about the beloved movie "A Little Princess" in this comprehensive article. From behind-the-scenes trivia to memorable moments, dive deeper into this timeless classic.
data.text:
A Little Princess was released in 1995.

Directed by Alfonso Cuarón, this heartwarming film adaptation of Frances Hodgson Burnett’s classic novel captivated audiences upon its release.

The movie is set during World War I.

A Little Princess takes place in London, England, during the tumultuous backdrop of the First World War.

It follows the story of Sara Crewe.

Sara Crewe, a young girl from a wealthy background, is enrolled at Miss Minchin’s boarding school while her father serves in the war.

The movie explores themes of hope and resilience.

A Little Princess beautifully portrays the power of imagination and the strength of the human spirit in the face of adversity.

“A Little Princess” has a star-studded cast.

A Little Princess received critical acclaim.

The film was praised for its heartfelt storytelling, stunning visuals, and exceptional performances.

Sara forges meaningful connections with her fellow students, proving that bonds can be formed even in the most challenging circumstances.

In conclusion, A Little Princess is a timeless and beloved movie that captivates audiences of all ages. With its touching story, remarkable performances, and stunning visuals, it has secured its place as a classic in the film industry. FAQs

1. Who directed the movie A Little Princess?

The movie A Little Princess was directed by Alfonso Cuarón.

2. Is A Little Princess based on a book?

Yes, the movie A Little Princess is based on the 1905 children’s novel of the same name by Frances Hodgson Burnett.

3. When was the movie released?

A Little Princess was released in 1995.

4. Who plays the lead role of Sara Crewe in the movie?

The lead role of Sara Crewe is played by Liesel Matthews.

5. Where was the movie filmed?

The movie A Little Princess was filmed in various locations, including England, the United States, and Mexico.

6. Is the movie suitable for children?

Yes, A Little Princess is generally considered suitable for children of all ages, although parental guidance may be advised for younger viewers due to emotional themes.

7. Does the movie have any awards or nominations?

Yes, A Little Princess received several awards and nominations, including nominations for two Academy Awards.

8. What is the runtime of the movie?

The runtime of A Little Princess is approximately 97 minutes.
